results.content: This course is quite comprehensive when compared with other courses available on this platform which is why I bought it. It is packed full of amazing content and like the description, it did make me a full stack web developer. The instructor is a very good teacher using visual aids (not just talking) and simple illustrations to drive home a point. This course does not teach everything but the basics of everything frontend and backend. I enjoyed the course, the jokes, the projects, challenges.
